name: Space Command
description:
Join the Space Force in protecting the galaxy from evil aliens! 

On your first mission into space, aliens attack as they always do but this time they were able to blast a hole in the space force space dolphin holding tank! Hurry and help the space command collect the space dolphins and destroy the evil aliens!

Movement: left and right arrows to rotate, spacebar to boost forward.

Shooting: Z key

Dialogue: Enter key
